verses.verse: And the Lord <WH3068> called <WH7121> unto Moses <WH4872>, and spoke <WH1696> unto him out of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH120>, If anyone of you brings <WH7126> an offering <WH7133> unto the Lord <WH3068>, you shall bring <WH7126> your offering <WH7133> of the cattle <WH929>, even of the herd <WH1241>, and of the flock <WH6629>.

If his offering <WH7133> is a burnt sacrifice <WH5930> of the herd <WH1241>, let him offer <WH7126> a male <WH2145> without blemish <WH8549>: he shall offer <WH7126> it of his own voluntary will <WH7522> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>.
And he shall put <WH5564> his hand <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the burnt offering <WH5930>; and it shall be accepted <WH7521> for him to make atonement for him <WH3722>.

And he shall kill <WH7819> the bullock <WH1121> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>: and the priests <WH3548>, Aaron <WH175>'s sons <WH1121>, shall bring <WH7126> the blood <WH1818>, and sprinkle <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> round about <WH5439> upon the altar <WH4196> that is by the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.
And he shall flay <WH6584> the burnt offering <WH5930>, and cut <WH5408> it into his pieces <WH5409>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> shall put <WH5414> fire <WH784> upon the altar <WH4196>, and lay the wood <WH6086> in order <WH6186> upon the fire <WH784>:

And the priests <WH3548>, Aaron <WH175>'s sons <WH1121>, shall lay <WH6186> the parts <WH5409>, the head <WH7218>, and the fat <WH6309>, in order <WH6186> upon the wood <WH6086> that is on the fire <WH784> which is upon the altar <WH4196>:

But his innards <WH7130> and his legs <WH3767> shall he wash <WH7364> in water <WH4325>: and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> all on the altar <WH4196>, to be a burnt sacrifice <WH5930>, an offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

And if his offering <WH7133> be of the flocks <WH6629>, namely <WH3775>, of the sheep, or of the goats <WH5795>, for a burnt sacrifice <WH5930>; he shall bring <WH7126> it a male <WH2145> without blemish <WH8549>.

And he shall kill <WH7819> it on the side <WH3409> of the altar <WH4196> northward <WH6828> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>: and the priests <WH3548>, Aaron <WH175>'s sons <WH1121>, shall sprinkle <WH2236> his blood <WH1818> round about <WH5439> upon the altar <WH4196>.

And he shall cut <WH5408> it into his pieces <WH5409>, with his head <WH7218> and his fat <WH6309>: and the priest <WH3548> shall lay them in order <WH6186> on the wood <WH6086> that is on the fire <WH784> which is upon the altar <WH4196>:

But he shall wash <WH7364> the innards <WH7130> and the legs <WH3767> with water <WH4325>: and the priest <WH3548> shall bring <WH7126> it all <WH6999>, and burn it upon the altar <WH4196>: it is a burnt sacrifice <WH5930>, an offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

And if the burnt sacrifice <WH5930> for his offering <WH7133> to the Lord <WH3068> be of birds <WH5775>, then he shall bring <WH7126> his offering <WH7133> of turtledoves <WH8449>, or of young <WH1121> pigeons <WH3123>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall bring <WH7126> it unto the altar <WH4196>, and wring off <WH4454> his head <WH7218>, and burn <WH6999> it on the altar <WH4196>; and the blood <WH1818> there shall be wrung out <WH4680> at the side <WH7023> of the altar <WH4196>:

And he shall pluck away <WH5493> his crop <WH4760> with his feathers <WH5133>, and cast <WH7993> it beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196> on the east part <WH6924>, by the place <WH4725> of the ashes <WH1880>:

And he shall cleave <WH8156> it with the wings <WH3671> there <WH914>, but shall not divide it asunder: and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> it upon the altar <WH4196>, upon the wood <WH6086> that is upon the fire <WH784>: it is a burnt sacrifice <WH5930>, an offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381> unto the Lord <WH3068>.
